title: How to Use a Daruma Good Luck Doll

steps.title: Buy your Daruma doll in the beginning of a new year.
steps.content: Buy your Daruma doll in the beginning of a new year. At this stage the doll has eyes without pupils. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fill in the left eye of the Daruma, while concentrating on your wish.
steps.content: Fill in the left eye of the Daruma, while concentrating on your wish.

steps.title: Place your Daruma in your house altar.
steps.content: Place your Daruma in your house altar. If unavailable, give it another prominent place. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Add the right eye when and if the wish comes true.
steps.content: Add the right eye when and if the wish comes true. [3] X Research source
